GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.6 to before v5.15.6
GSD.description:
io_uring: fix link traversal locking

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.6 by commit 1c939a53b26b6b39378a77f76a49be8dd6df7af0, it was introduced in version v5.15.6 by commit 09eb40f6776c8b50c2e46a504bf5483440ca607d. For more details please see the references link.
